question: Check the Internet for the latest on the diabetes drug Avandia and the alarming side effects.  There are numerous lawsuits being filed and numerous calls for the FDA to take the drug off the market.  Naturally, GlaxoSmithKline, the makers of the drug, are denying the allegations.While on the Internet, check out the stories about Januvia/Janumet, a form of insulin which has been said to cause pancreatitis.If you are taking medication for anything, especially high blood pressure and/or cholesterol, please be alert to the possibility of increased blood glucose readings.  The Internet is also full of info on drug-induced diabetes.
title: Side Effects of Avandia
